entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
